executable.title: Detect glomeruli

executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of efforts in digital pathology for KPMP by the Sarder Lab: SUNY Buffalo.

file.name: inputModelFile_data
file.label: Input Model File - data
file.description: Tensorflow model file (model.ckpt-*.data*) of the deeplab model for segmentation

file.name: inputModelFile
file.label: Input Model File - index
file.description: Tensorflow model file (model.ckpt-*.index) of the deeplab model for segmentation

file.name: outputAnnotationFile
file.label: Output Glomeruli Annotation File
file.description: Output annotation file (*.anot) containing glomerular annotations

integer.name: wsi_downsample
integer.label: Analysis Tile Downsample
integer.description: The downsample rate at which the analysis should be performed w.r.t. full resolution

integer.name: patch_overlap
integer.label: Number of overlap
integer.description: The number of times patches overlap durring analysis

double.name: remove_border
double.label: Remove patch border
double.description: The percent (decimal) of the patch border which is discarded prior to stitching - removes edge artifacts (this requires sufficient patch overlap)

integer.name: batch_size
integer.label: Analysis Batch Size
integer.description: The batch size for processing WSI patches

integer.name: min_size
integer.label: Minimum object size
integer.description: The minimum size in pixels of objects detected by the analysis - a value of 0 does not remove small objects
